content.p: The University of Nottingham is proud to be one of the founder members of Universitas 21 (U21), the leading international network of research-intensive universities. Through the U21 network we are actively engaged in a range of collaborative activities with like-minded universities around the world. This enables us to: The Universitas 21 network supports staff and students in many activities at the University of Nottingham. The network of Universitas 21 universities has opened up student mobility options to a much wider group of students at Nottingham through the options of semester long programmes, summer schools and specialist research conferences. uonglobal@nottingham.ac.uk
